overview: A down on his luck college student searching desperately for his next source of income takes a job as a public canvasser, going out on the street and drumming up petitions for whatever topic the marketing company deems important at the time. Frustrated that no one seems to take the things he is advocating for seriously, he decides to take matters into his own hands, creating a wild petition campaign unlike any the world has ever seen.
title: Save Our Oceans
